directions.d: Set oven to broil and line a oven safe pan with aluminum foil.
Broil salmon steaks on the prepared pan 12 minutes, or until salman can be flaked with a fork.
On stovetop, heat olive oil over a medium heat in a pan.
Dice the red onion and sautee in oil.

Dice the tomatoes, peel and mince the garlic cloves, and chop the fresh cilantro. Stir in garlic, tomatoes, and cilantro in the pan. Cook until heated through, 1 to 2 minutes, and remove from heat. Peel and dice the mango around the core. Mix in the diced mangoes. Serve salsa mix over the salmon steaks. Add a pinch of salt to desired taste.
